website_summaries.verdict: Nearly double the performance of last year’s 10.5-inch iPad thanks to a powerful processor, making this one of the best tablets on the market.
pros: The tablet’s AI2Z chip performs incredibly well, helping boost the brilliance of its sharp, detailed screen
Charges quickly, and works with the 2nd-generation Apple Pencil
cons: Screen is just as vulnerable to drops as its predecessors

customer_reviews.title: Purchase reason and use experience
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely the king of pad. Best screen, speakers, and processor. I have to say that the iPad does have a better app ecosystem than Android tablets. The reason I bought this iPad Pro is for business and entertainment. Combined with the Apple pencil and new keyboard, it can help me a lot in taking notes and calculations. By the way, if you're buying a tablet just for entertainment, I really suggest you to think about iPad air, iPad mini5 or Huawei mate pad pro since they have better value for money.
customer_reviews.author: Porcelain

customer_reviews.title: The only tablet that matters today.
customer_reviews.text: Arrived today and after settings things up THIS THING IS JUST A MONSTER. Purchased the smaller version as its easier to hold and manage especially when reading. The pencil is a must. Cheers from Bulgaria. 10 stars.
customer_reviews.author: matt ploszanski

customer_reviews.title: Lives up to the hype.
customer_reviews.text: The iPad Pro 11-inch is a work of art. The iPad Pro is the best tablet you can buy on the market. The quality of build is stunning, along with a crisp, bright screen and loud stereo speakers. Everything about this tablet screams money, which it should because it cost enough. Also, the new iPad OS takes the experience to another level. If you have the money, it's a no-brainer.
customer_reviews.author: Glen Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: This iPad is just epic. That’s the only one word for it.
customer_reviews.author: Zaf

customer_reviews.title: Good as expected
customer_reviews.text: My favorite Apple design like the 5s SE. Fast machine. Excellent display. Best camera on a tablet I even have and seen.
customer_reviews.author: Peter M

customer_reviews.title: No ID no go.
customer_reviews.text: Tried to get started by following instructions and finished up going round in circles in response to the systems (on iPAD) request for an ID we did not have. Sent it back via Amazon return service (does not provide a receipt) over two months ago and heard no more about it nor about my money. Set up Zoom on windows desktop - a better idea
customer_reviews.author: Cocinero77

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the upgrade!
customer_reviews.text: Oh boy !! I had the original I pad pro but decided I fancy a new one,,,,, you think the new model will be similar? But no this is SUPERB !!! Screen quality is sooooo much better! And fast ! Wow ! And it feels so much nicer ( yes it matters!) and of course it’s slimmer and lighter, I bought the cheaper folio case with keyboard with it ,,,, simply because the magic Keyboard is well overpriced Apple !! And I have a touchpad already
customer_reviews.author: Yorkie

customer_reviews.title: The best thing I bought this year.
customer_reviews.text: The best thing I bought this year. Its all been said before, but you cant go wrong with ipad Pro 2020 model. With hind sight I would not have bought the apple pencil, as I dont really have any use for it. Oh well looks nice ! Takes a while to master the hand gestures as no home button / finger print recognition now, but if you watch a few videos you pick up easily. Replaces my old ipad gen2 which Ive had since 2011 !? Wow what an upgrade !
customer_reviews.author: Tech Jon

customer_reviews.title: Expensive but worth every penny! 😁
customer_reviews.text: I decided to treat myself during this lockdown period as my old iPad mini is slowly dying. I am so glad I took the plunge and treated myself! The power of this iPad is incredible and the quality of the graphics are insane! I have used it for photoshop/Lightroom/rush and it’s so easy to use these programs on here. I would totally recommend that if you are tempted about this iPad, just go for it because you won’t be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: AlexCompton

customer_reviews.title: Best tablet on the market
customer_reviews.text: This is excellent piece of gear. I can recommend this to anyone who is looking for best tablet. I opted for the 11inch version as I fell this is best size for tablet and perfect bridge between my iPhone XS Max and 16inch MacBook Pro
customer_reviews.author: Lukas

customer_reviews.title: awesome
customer_reviews.text: very good quality product, I just wish Microsoft could build products of this quality
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer.

customer_reviews.title: the best tablet on the market
customer_reviews.text: honestly just don't think twice, if you need a tablet or even if you need a laptop or macbook, this is the best of both worlds. when paired with the apple ipad pro magic keyboard and the apple pencil you get a seamless experience perfect for studying, entertainment, graphic design, music production and much more! very expensive but you receive the premium apple experience and if you have other apple devices it makes even more sense to buy.
customer_reviews.author: Ahmed Shami

customer_reviews.text: It’s the best iPad available so there is nothing to dislike. The screen size, picture quality, cameras, speakers, weight and thinness : all superb.
customer_reviews.author: Greg T.

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant
customer_reviews.text: It’s amazing!! Didn’t upgrade my tablet for 8 year (yeah I know! Haha) and I think I just did it at the right time. What a machine this iPad Pro is.
customer_reviews.author: Susana F.

customer_reviews.title: Best thing since corned beef!
customer_reviews.text: Such a step up from my iPad the pro.Loving the multi-tasking with split screens and screen casting.I am learning how to do illustrations and it helps having an open window with instruction videos while working! Speaks not too shabby either! I would def recommend you buy this, I got mine cheaper coz I got smaller storage then using external storage, brill.
customer_reviews.author: Bantu Kitchner, GY

customer_reviews.title: Size really didn’t matter.
customer_reviews.text: Bought to replace iPad Pro I, and I was really worried I wouldn’t be able to get used to smaller screen, however it was no problem, I instantly adjusted to everything, even Procreate. New pencil is superb, and the whole thing is faster lighter and better. Plus, if you consider I had my last one since April 2016, it only cost me 4 quid a week, so...No regrets.
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: NEW IPAD PRO 11 2020 2nd GENERATION 128gb
customer_reviews.text: Great iPad Pro 11” 2020 version, 128gb I gave my last one to my son, this is an improvement my other one was only 64gb. There are quite a few differences, I tried a 12.9” but it was too big for me. I love these you can write letters etc and print them out easily. No need for a laptop. 100% Reccomended
customer_reviews.author: Hed4

customer_reviews.title: be very careful while handling and DO INSPECT THE IPAD CLOSELY AFTER UNPACKING,
customer_reviews.text: After 3 weeks the ipad screen went black and we asked Apple for help. they tried to re-vive the ipad on line, but it did not work so they asked us to send them the equipment. They then told us the Ipad was bent. Untrue, but we could not prove this. they asked for nearly £500 to repair the Ipad. We contacted Jeff Bezos , CEO of Amazon and explained the situation. Amazon immediately sent us a replacement. NEVER ORDER FROM APPLE DIRECTLY
customer_reviews.author: bookboar

customer_reviews.title: Good option for professionals
customer_reviews.text: a bit too expensive for what it is, but that's Apple for you. I've bought it as it seems the best option for architecture. The quality is indeed great, quite light, great speakers and display. Consider a cheaper alternative if you're going to use it for online browsing or Netflix
customer_reviews.author: Teddy Boo

customer_reviews.title: I finally took the plunge
customer_reviews.text: My wife’s had iPads (1st gen and retina) for years and I wasn’t overly impressed with their performance compared to my decent spec Windows laptop. However, this is my first iPad and I love it. Although I’m only an occasional user I find it to be fast with great graphics and sound.
customer_reviews.author: JezzyB

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: The best iPad I’ve owned without doubt, although only slightly bigger screen than last version it does make a difference, it seems quicker and a better battery life as well, facial recognition is very quick to react as well!
customer_reviews.author: Superted

customer_reviews.title: It's Apple!
customer_reviews.text: Bought it as a gift, because of my experience with Apple products. The recipient is highly pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Roy Wright

customer_reviews.title: Best iPad yet
customer_reviews.text: The best iPad yet! Great narrow all round bezels and blazing fast. Love the way you can also pair it with your mouse and trackpad. Sidecar is also an excellent feature. Great for reading epapers. And with the Apple Pencil you can do some great digital note taking with apps like Noteshelf, Nebo, Goodnotes etc.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Cousins

customer_reviews.title: Great from
customer_reviews.text: Using this device daily from browsing to video editing and it’s amazing. Couldn’t be without an iPad now
customer_reviews.author: NMay89

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Bought for daughter this is an awesome bit of kit highly reccomend
customer_reviews.author: sean c hardcastle

customer_reviews.title: Small Upgrade
customer_reviews.text: Almost same as 2018 Version. If u have 2018 Version u do not have to upgrade it. If u do not have 2018 version. 2020 Version is still a good choice
customer_reviews.author: OWEN

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: Nothing to dislike about this iPad , it’s absolutely amazing , very quick and responsive, crystal clear display and the sound quality is fabulous .
customer_reviews.author: hitch

customer_reviews.title: Works well and looks great!
customer_reviews.text: A great iPad, very fast to boot up, such an improvement over my old iPad. Works well and looks great with the magic keyboard and pencil
customer_reviews.author: Paul Lawrence

customer_reviews.title: Good Ipad
customer_reviews.text: Upgraded from iPad Pro 2017 as it stopped working!!!!! The new iPad Pro is very nice. I prefer Touch ID over Face ID. Especially the position they have placed it my hand is always blocking the camera in landscape mode.
customer_reviews.author: Mr M McCarron

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous
customer_reviews.text: I can’t recommend this enough, I love it, gave 4 star for value only because apple is always dear, but I just love it 😊
customer_reviews.author: Neil Young

customer_reviews.title: Trustworthy name
customer_reviews.text: This is my third Apple iPad, I like the brand, and hopefully this one will live longer than my last one.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Slim and light
customer_reviews.text: Slim and light. Easy to transfer all my apps etc from old iPad. Excellent colour. Photos are really good. Glad I bought this. It is expensive that’s why only 4 stars for value for money.
customer_reviews.author: MR AR BROWN

customer_reviews.title: I pad
customer_reviews.text: I use everyday, since I’ve had my iPad the laptop has become redundant.
customer_reviews.author: Grace M

customer_reviews.title: Apple iPad Pro
customer_reviews.text: What is there there not to like? Once again a great bit of kit from Apple.
customer_reviews.author: Tony  Haran

customer_reviews.title: Like all apple products, it is great
customer_reviews.text: It does exactly what I want it to do. It is exactly what it says on the tin and what you're expecting.
customer_reviews.author: IOW Guy

customer_reviews.title: Not much change from last gen
customer_reviews.text: It is an iPad. I’m pretty sure people who buys this knows what they are doing
customer_reviews.author: Armstrong F.

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant
customer_reviews.text: Can’t fault this, I’ve binned off my laptop and now use this for everything. Just wish i done it along time ago. Get what you pay for with apple.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great device for most tasks
customer_reviews.text: It can be used instead of the computer for most of the daily usage. It works incredibly fast with great 120Hz refresh rate which really makes a difference.
customer_reviews.author: Patrik

customer_reviews.title: Impressive
customer_reviews.text: A top class product and as always, a good spec.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Ipad
customer_reviews.text: What a great piece of kit best iPad I've ever had. Expensive but worth it fantastic screen and very fast
customer_reviews.author: nigel perry

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant tech features !
customer_reviews.text: Love the new I pad and the swipe features ❤️State of the art ! Well done Apple
customer_reviews.author: charlotte c.

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this ipad for my daughter .she was so pleased with it. Thickness is perfect! Just what we want for the ipad
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Really awesome machine for casual use (eg Reading/Movies/Word/Excel).
customer_reviews.text: Its the best tablet compared to the others. Its incredible smooth especially with Pro Motion (240hz on touch). It's really portable, most of the time I don't carry my laptop at all.
customer_reviews.author: Dimitar

customer_reviews.title: Very handy to use
customer_reviews.text: Mainly for email and for information gathering I found it to be very quick and responsive
customer_reviews.author: George Todman

customer_reviews.title: Bit to expensive for what your getting.
customer_reviews.text: It says the camera is going to be amazing, but it's abit blurred when u zoom in, but great picture, but over £800 is far to expensive.
customer_reviews.author: Toby l.

customer_reviews.title: Amazon.co.uk has great workers!
customer_reviews.text: Thank you to those in Amazon.co.uk - Really happy with the Ipad; It was nice and early, too.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer
